fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
Town of Salem 2
Attack: Unstoppable
Defense: Basic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Doom: Guess the roles of 3 players. If correct on all 3, you deal an astral attack to all of them and you gain invincible defense until you leave the town. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you successfully doom your targets, you walk away from town in victory.
- You cannot receive more charges of your ability.
- If there are less than 3 other players alive, you kill yourself.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__ If part of this faction, does not leave town in victory upon winning.
